channel.name: BBC One NL
channel.title: The Hit List
channel.desc: Marvin and Rochelle Humes host the exciting and highly addictive music quiz, where contestants must name as many hit songs and artists as possible under intense pressure. Competing to show off their music knowledge and win ?10,000 are brothers Cam and Bailey from Sawbridgeworth, best friends Holly and Khadi from London and Cardiff, and stepdad and stepdaughter Mark and Lauren from South Derbyshire. Get ready to play along and shout out the answers at the telly!
